tasks.label: Postgres PSQL
tasks.command: docker exec -it postgres bash -c "psql -U postgres -d postgres"

tasks.label: Kafka
tasks.command: docker-compose exec kafka /kafka/bin/kafka-console-consumer.sh --bootstrap-server kafka:9092 --from-beginning --property print.key=true --topic dbserver2.public.links

tasks.label: Spark Submit - Client
tasks.command: docker exec -it spark-client bash -c "cd /opt/src && spark-submit --master spark://spark-master:7077 --packages org.apache.spark:spark-sql-kafka-0-10_2.12:3.4.1,io.delta:delta-core_2.12:2.4.0 streaming_from_kafka_to_minio.py"
